title: How to find my grandfather who was an immigrant in US and is dead now? Is there any chance of finding out where his grave is - Quora
tags: Immigration to the United States of America

response.answer_text: First, are you sure he is dead. He may still be alive and living somewhere in the USA. If you want to find out what grave he is in, first find out what state and city he lived in. Next get a phone book and start calling all the cemetaries in the state. If thats to much work, join one of those family tree websites, they will have the information about your grand pa.
